item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE) knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = here::here()) library(tidyverse) library(plotly) Read data vot <- read_csv("./static/data/chodroff2019/ChodroffGoldenWilson2019_vot_avg.csv") %>% group_by(vot.category) %>% mutate(vot.mu_z = scale(vot.mu)) %>% ungroup() %>% pivot_wider(names_from = poa.broad, values_from = c(vot.mu, vot.mu_z)) %>% mutate(vot_category = recode(vot.category, long.lag = "long lag", short.lag = "short lag")) Mean VOT vot %>% plot_ly( x = ~vot.mu_labial, y = ~vot.mu_coronal, z = ~vot.mu_dorsal, color = ~vot_category, text = ~language, marker = list(size = 5, opacity = 0.
